plot: A man is distraught over his sister's recent brutal attack. In his search for the assailant, he must decide whether to seek justice or revenge.
title: Distorted
plot_es: A man is distraught over his sister's recent brutal attack. In his search for the assailant, he must decide whether to seek justice or revenge.
plot_en: A man is distraught over his sister's recent brutal attack. In his search for the assailant, he must decide whether to seek justice or revenge.
